initContainers.name: pgbouncer-auth-file

containers.name: prometheus-postgres-exporter
args:
run_postgres_exporter() {
  set -x
  exec /usr/local/bin/postgres_exporter \
    --log.level=info
}

set +x
while true
do
  if ( [ -z "$PID" ] || [ ! -d "/proc/$PID" ] ) \
    && [ -S '/var/run/postgresql/.s.PGSQL.5432' ]
  then
    if [ -n "$PID" ]
    then
      kill "$PID"
      wait "$PID" || true
    fi
    run_postgres_exporter &
    PID="$!"
  fi
  sleep 5
done
